one-word-many-uses.name: One word, many uses
one-word-many-uses.hookFormula: Most learners memorize ten words. Pros master one word in five situations.
one-word-many-uses.setupFormula: Today we lock one Thai pattern that you can deploy in daily life, chat, and social content.
one-word-many-uses.teachingBlockFormula: Start with meaning, then usage contrast, then a practical line you can copy.
one-word-many-uses.recapFormula: Repeat the core line once normal speed and once slow speed.
one-word-many-uses.ctaFormula: Comment your own sentence and I’ll correct it in PTM transliteration.

contrast-hook.name: Contrast hook
contrast-hook.hookFormula: Most videos teach this wrong. Let’s fix it in under two minutes.
contrast-hook.setupFormula: I’ll show right vs wrong, then give you a safe sentence you can post today.
contrast-hook.teachingBlockFormula: Contrast wrong usage with right usage and end each block with a spoken drill.
contrast-hook.recapFormula: Three quick checkpoints: pronunciation, context, and confidence cue.
contrast-hook.ctaFormula: Save this and duet with your version for feedback.
